Abstrak: Focuses on the use of realistic-inspired artwork by Expressionist artist Wassily Kandinsky in teaching fifth-grade students to create their own expressionist works of art. Objectives of the lesson; Materials to be used in the lesson; Application of students' knowledge about the color wheel in their artwork.
Sumber: Arts & Activities. Jan2005, Vol. 136 Issue 5, p26-27. 2p. 1 Color Photograph.
